intent_atoms.description: Move Selection Details content to the third column of NavigationSplitView and move Integrity Summary to the Inspector panel – display it when pressing a button at the top of the second panel of NavigationSplitView where Box Tree is displayed.
Selection Details fully accessible in third column when a box is selected
Integrity Summary toggleable via button on Box Tree panel header
Both views adapt to available space in Inspector column (scrolling where needed)
Keyboard shortcuts work: ⌘⌃S for sidebar toggle, ⌘⌥I for inspector toggle
VoiceOver labels correctly identify UI elements and state
All existing functionality preserved (notes, field selection, hex navigation, etc.)
Three-column layout stable across macOS, iPad portrait, iPad landscape, iPhone
No regressions in existing tests (35+ from NavigationSplitScaffold, 15+ integration tests)
The system must always maintain a three‑column layout when the device supports it and hide or collapse columns appropriately on compact size classes.
Use NavigationSplitScaffold pattern with .balanced style and minimum column widths: sidebar 280pt, content 320pt, inspector 360pt.
Selection Details will be extracted into InspectorDetailView container composed of sub‑components (Metadata, Corruption, Encryption, Notes, Fields, Validation, Hex).
Integrity Summary will be moved to the Inspector column and controlled by a toggle button in the Box Tree panel header.
InspectorDetailView will conditionally render SelectionDetailsView or SelectionIntegritySummaryView based on @State showIntegritySummary.
The toggle button will expose VoiceOver labels, keyboard shortcut ⌘⌥I and update parent state to switch inspector content.
Responsive design: when inspector width >500pt show both views side‑by‑side; between 360-500pt use tabs or segmented picker; <360pt stack with scroll.
Accessibility audit will ensure VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type and contrast meet WCAG AA.

functional_units.name: NavigationSplitView Three-Column Layout
functional_units.description: Provides a three-column UI with Sidebar (primary), Content (secondary), and Inspector (detail) columns.

functional_units.name: InspectorDetailView Container
functional_units.description: Aggregates Selection Details and Integrity Summary views within the Inspector column, managing toggle state.

functional_units.name: SelectionDetailsView
functional_units.description: Displays metadata, corruption, encryption, notes, field annotations, validation, and hex sections for a selected box.

functional_units.name: SelectionIntegritySummaryView
functional_units.description: Shows integrity summary information, including sort controls, filter bar, issue list, and navigation to the tree.

functional_units.name: BoxTreePanelHeader with Toggle Button
functional_units.description: Adds a button in the Box Tree panel header that toggles between showing Selection Details or Integrity Summary in the Inspector column.

functional_units.name: Keyboard Shortcuts for Column Visibility
functional_units.description: Provides ⌘⌃S to toggle sidebar visibility and ⌘⌥I to toggle inspector visibility or content.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Layer for Inspector Components
functional_units.description: Implements VoiceOver labels, keyboard navigation, dynamic type support, and contrast compliance for all inspector UI elements.

functional_units.name: Responsive Layout Logic for Inspector Column
functional_units.description: Adjusts the display of Selection Details and Integrity Summary based on available width (tabs, split view, or stacked).
